Variables
SharpNeat.​Neat.​Speciation.​GeneticKMeans.​Parallelized
namespace SharpNeat.Neat.Speciation.GeneticKMeans.Parallelized
GeneticKMeansSpeciationInit
internal sealed
GeneticKMeansSpeciationInit​<T>
where T : struct

GeneticKMeansSpeciationStrategy initialisation.  This class handles initialising the k-means clusters (species), i.e. it takes a population of genomes and forms an initial set of k-means clusters with which to begin running the k-means iterations upon.  upon.  Note. this implementation applies a modified version of the k-means++ initialisation method.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.
